name: Vicks NaturalCare Cool Mist Ultrasonic Humidifier (VUL530), White, Small Room – Humidifier and Diffuser with Nighttime Light, Works with Vicks VapoPads
short_description: COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER – Vicks NaturalCare Cool Mist Humidifier is a natural way to support your wellbeing. Get temporary relief from stuffy nose, cough, congestion and more. This filter-free humidifier is an essential part of a good night’s sleep.
ESSENTIAL OIL DIFFUSER – This small humidifier is also an essential oil diffuser. You can add essential oils directly to the water tank for relaxation and aromatherapy. Essential oils not included.

SOOTHING COLOR CHANGING LIGHTS – Cool mist humidifier with essential oil diffuser has customizable color changing lights with an optional nighttime dimming feature, variable mist control and directional mist outlet so you’re always relaxed & comfortable.

BETTER BREATHING YEAR ROUND – Cool mist humidifiers for home are ideal year-round, but are especially helpful during cold season, when it’s difficult for children to sleep with cough and congestion, making it a great choice as a kids or baby humidifier.

HUMIDIFIERS FOR BEDROOM AND MORE – A cool mist humidifier fits perfectly into any small sized room so you can create your ideal sanctuary. It works for up to 24 hours with a quiet operation, and has a wide tank opening for easy filling and easy cleaning.
product_description: Provide natural support for your wellbeing and create your ideal sanctuary with Vicks NaturalCare Cool Mist Ultrasonic Humidifier. It’s a cool mist humidifier with essential oil diffuser, plus it accepts Vicks VapoPads and has calming color changing lights to create a peaceful, restorative environment. Designed for year round use to support your wellness - winter cough and cold season, spring pollen relief, or just for relaxing with naturally comforting cool mist.    Humidifiers for home can be helpful during cold season, when it’s difficult for children to sleep with cough/congestion. For calming aromatherapy, add a few drops of your favorite essential oils to the water and turn the powerful humidifier into an essential oil diffuser (oils not included). You can also use Vicks VapoPads and enjoy the comforting, nostalgic scent of Vicks. To complete your oasis, simply turn on the color-changing light and soothe yourself with the peaceful glow. Delivering multiple solutions in one, NaturalCare makes it simple to support your wellness year-round, naturally. This Vicks humidifier is ideal for small rooms and is quick and easy to use and clean. The wide tank opening offers easy filling and cleaning. You can enjoy visible cool mist for up to 24 hours on the lowest setting, or utilize the auto shut-off. It’s quiet, and customizable color changing lights with an optional nighttime feature make it a great choice for your bedroom or as a baby humidifier for nursery or kids rooms. Holds up to 2 Vicks VapoPads for additional soothing comfort (one sample included). At Vicks, we believe that everyone deserves a touch of care. Vicks is the #1 brand recommended by Pediatricians.* Our line of humidifiers, steam inhalers and vaporizers help you breathe better and sleep more comfortably, wherever you are. *Based on a March 2020 survey of Pediatricians conducted by Arendt Consulting, of those Pediatricians who recommend humidifiers, Vicks brand humidifiers are the most often recommended.

name: Evaporative Duct Mount Whole House Furnace Humidifier, Atomizing Cool Mist Variable Capacities for Homes and Offices from 1000 to 3500 sq. ft.
short_description: FLEXIBLE CAPABILITY. By changing the number of fine mist nozzles (1 to 5), adjusting the water pressure and the warm air temperature, DIGI MISTER humidifier can be used for homes and offices of various sizes from 1000 to 3500 sq. ft., as well as work with different types of furnaces.

EASY INSTALLATION. With a patented compact design this humidifier only needs a small cut-out for installation and can fit into a small area and tight space easily. No duct work and drainage is required, and the connection is simple and easy. A 24VAC transformer is required. Certain HVAC expertise is needed to perform the installation.

CONVENIENT MAINTENANCE. Through an observation window, users can visually check the water mist status to make sure for a complete evaporation. Spray nozzles can be conveniently tested and cleaned by using a nozzle tester away from the humidifier. With a “swing-out” design the spray nozzles can be replaced effortlessly. The package includes extra replacement nozzles. Users must ensure that the water pressure is adequate, and all nozzles spray fine atomized water mist.

FULL DIGITAL CONTROL. Users can precisely set and adjust room humidity, duct air temperature, as well as many other secondary parameters, such as humidity value calibration, temperature unit between °F and °C, etc.

WATER, ELECTRICITY and Money SAVING. Water is sprayed into the duct under a suitable water pressure (>30 psi) to form an atomized mist which fully evaporates into the air, with no wasted water running off and down the drain. No high water pressure pump, no power fan or high wattage electrode are needed for a very quiet operation and no more evaporative water pads or expansive steam canisters to buy once every winter season.

name: Dreo 8L Smart Humidifiers for Bedroom 600ft², 80H Runtime Warm&Cool Supersized Mist Humidifier for Large Room Indoor, Quiet Whole House humidifier for Baby, Plants, with Alexa/Google, Silver, HM717S

name: AprilAire 600 17-gal. Whole-House Large Bypass Evaporative Humidifier with Automatic Digital Control for up to 5,000 sq. ft. + AprilAire Model 5844 Humidifier Installation Kit
short_description: BALANCED HUMIDITY FOR HEALTH AND HOME PRESERVATION – Help minimize the formation of bacteria, viruses, fungi, and dust mites that thrive in low humidity and help preserve wood floors, cabinetry, furnishings, and other items susceptible to dry air

WHOLE-HOUSE HUMIDIFICATION – Deliver 17 gallons of moisture per day in homes up to 5,000 sq. ft. with trouble-free performance and minimal maintenance. The water panel removes impurities before adding moisture to the air. Use genuine AprilAire 35 Water Panel for annual replacement

AUTOMATIC CONTROL – The included Model 60 Automatic Digital Humidistat monitors your home's air providing precise control and the onboard sensor actively measures the relative humidity throughout your home and turns on the humidifier when needed giving you peace of mind

INSTALLATION KIT – No need to find the parts yourself. This convenient bundle comes with all of the genuine AprilAire parts needed for installations in homes with ducted heating systems plus detailed installation instructions

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – AprilAire Whole-House Humidifiers are designed and assembled in the USA using US and global components by AprilAire, the leader in Indoor Air Quality solutions for the home since 1954, and come with a 5-year warranty

INCLUDES – 600 Whole-House Humidifier, Model 60 Automatic Digital Humidistat, (1) genuine AprilAire 35 Water Panel, (4) 8 x 3/4 Mounting Screws, 6" Round Duct Collar, 6" Round Bypass Flex Duct (2 ft.), ¼" outside diameter (OD) Water Supply Tube (25 ft.), ½" interior diameter (ID) Drain Tube (10 ft.), ⅝" Hose Clamp, 18/2 Thermostat Wire (25 ft.), 18/2 Thermostat Wire (10 ft.), 18/5 Thermostat Wire (10 ft.), and (4) Twist-On Wire Nut Connectors
product_description: The AprilAire 600 Whole-House Humidifier is designed for homes up to 5,000 sq. ft., delivering optimal relative humidity to balance out the dry, hot air created by furnaces. The included digital humidistat has an onboard sensor and automatically controls the humidity level, using an outdoor temperature sensor to help create the optimal environment throughout your home. While balanced humidity exists between 40–60%, it's important to remember that outdoor temperature and other home factors will impact what relative humidity level is attainable and recommended for your house. You’ll enjoy balanced humidity thanks to the evaporative process, which works by passing hot, dry air from your furnace over the interior water panel to add moisture before returning the humidified air into your home using the existing blower fan in your HVAC system. The water panel is essential to the process, ensuring the removal of impurities from the water and providing uniform, high evaporation for whole-house humidification. AprilAire invented the whole-house evaporative humidifier in 1954, and this unit is designed and assembled in the USA utilizing US and global components. It offers multiple options for installation, making it simple to experience the benefits of balanced humidity throughout your living space.

short_description: The Ultimate Humidifying Solution: The humidifiers for bedroom HM713S brings super fast 500mL/hr humidification with faster warm mist (133°F in just 5 minutes) for instant dryness relief. Thanks to MistWave humidification technology, this Warm & Cool mist humidifier for large room creates a 40-inch tall mist with finer particles spread humidity evenly across any room you use it, while its 6L tank ensures long-run to humidify for days.

Precise Room Humidity Control: Thanks to its accurate sensing and compensation algorithm, the 6L smart air humidifier for plants lets you effectively set your target humidity with 5% tolerance, twice more precise than traditional top-fill humidifier, while its humidity indicator light lets you easily check your living room humidity from far away.

3 Modes - One Touch: The large room humidifier gives you more ways to customize humidity to your lifestyle. From its Manual Mode that includes 3 levels of mist, Auto Mode that lets you set your target humidity anywhere between 30% to 90%, and Sleep Mode that automatically turns off lightning and reduces noise for a peaceful sleep.

Easy and convenient smart APP: Keeping your air fresh and healthy is much easier thanks to the Dreo app. See real-time humidity readings, track humidity levels for up to 30 days, receive and customize smart cleaning reminders.
Dual-aroma Pad Tray: Change your environment in one step thanks to the new dual-aroma pad tray design, now you just need to move the aroma pad tray cover to switch between scents throughout the day.

Cartridge-ready Tank: DREO humidifiers feature a versatile tank design, perfect for using cartridges to boost performance or running seamlessly without them. Ready to take it to the next level? Search 'Dreo Demineralization Cartridge' to buy new cartridges.

name: AprilAire 600M Whole-House Humidifier, Manual High Output Furnace Humidifier, Large Capacity Whole-House Humidifier for Homes up to 5,000 Sq. Ft., White
short_description: BUY WITH CONFIDENCE This humidifier was designed and manufactured in the USA by AprilAire – the inventor of the whole home evaporative humidifier, and the leader in indoor air quality solutions
FULL COVERAGE up to 5,000 square feet in tightly built homes with a capacity of 17 gallons per day
MANUAL HUMIDIFIER with a single sensor built into the standard control monitors indoor relative humidity for use in manually setting the percent humidity in your home
FEEL MORE COMFORTABLE while also preserving items in your home susceptible to damage from changing humidity or dry conditions

HUMIDITY FOR HEALTH AprilAire Humidifiers can help you maintain optimal humidity in your home of 40% – 60% which has been shown to reduce the incidence of respiratory infections and symptoms related to allergies and asthma by minimizing the formation of bacteria and viruses, fungi, and dust mites. In addition, you’ll feel more comfortable while also preserving items in your home susceptible to damage from changing humidity or dry conditions
product_description: AprilAire introduced the first evaporative humidifier for forced air furnace systems back in 1954. Since that time, AprilAire continues to lead the industry in whole home humidification systems. Our evaporative humidifiers work by piping water into the distribution tray located at the top of the humidifier. The water is uniformly distributed across the width of the tray and through a scientifically designed system of outlets. It flows by gravity over the Water Panel evaporator. Dry, hot air from the HVAC system is moved through the moisture-laden Water Panel evaporator. Natural evaporation takes place, the water is turned to vapor, and the humidified air is circulated throughout your home. INCLUDED IN THE BOX: Installation instructions and template, humidifier with built-in bypass damper, 24 VAC transformer, manual humidifier control with sensor, saddle valve, solenoid valve, and Model # 35 Water Panel
